parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of control point for which to get the radius

title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.GetControlPointDistanceAtIndex
description: Gets the Distance 2 radius at the specified control point for the asymmetric fillet.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of control point for which to get the radius

returns: Value of the Distance 2 radius at the specified control point for the asymmetric fillet
remarks:
Call
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::GetControlPointRadiusAtIndex
to get the Distance 1 radius of the control point for this asymmetric fillet.
